contribution_desc: Presents the system DisplayPointers to explore the physical affordances of devices in cross-device interactions. Particularly touch between devices. Capacitative tracking with a small conductive marker was used for tracking touches of devices. The paper presents a number of techniques for cross-device interaction based on touching one devices with a second (or third) device.
tracking_characteristic: Outside-in tracking; Location 2D; Tracking devices only
interaction_techniques: Cross-device task chaining; UI distribution; Data transfer/sharing
